item.title: Welcome to This Might Get Weird
item.description: We're doing it! We, Grace and Mamrie, are FINALLY starting a podcast! Every Wednesday we'll be sharing some common sense, complete nonsense and mostly jokes at our own dispense! Strap in!
item.itunes:title: This Might Get Weird: It's Happening
item.itunes:author: This Might Get Weird
item.itunes:subtitle: We're doing it! We, Grace and Mamrie, are FINALLY starting a podcast! Every Wednesday we'll be sharing some common sense, complete nonsense and mostly jokes at our own dispense! Strap in!
